channel.title: Myth-Scape --GFX Spot Opened
channel.description:
Job Title: GFX Mod/Developer Job Objective: Overall, to create gfx's upon request of the administration on an as needed manner. Job Reward: Possibly a rank on forums if chosen.
Job Description:
The gfx artist should:
-Be able to plan accordingly to his/her job. -Be able to perform their job in a timely manner, while also taking their time for best effect and quality. -Be able to be on a three to five hour on call weekly schedule for when gfx are needed. -Be able to make professional looking videos. -Be able to make professional looking signatures, banners, modicons, usergroup ranking images, and etc in a very nice quality. -Be able to stay organized enough so where you can find a gfx if asked for an old one. -Be able to keep backups of all graphics. -Has the understanding that the job description may possibly change if needed.
Job Qualifications:
-At least six months of photoshop or in a related field required. (pictures) -At least three months of sony vegas or in a related field required (videos) -Must be a [b]trusted[/b] member of Moparscape -Must not be under the age of 13 (Forum Rules) -Must be able to supply vouches/references and examples upon request of interview.
To view our entire development please go here:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,526568.msg3835917.html#msg3835917
[hr]
To apply for this position you must meet all the requirements and be able to do the job reasonable enough to meet the needs of the community and server.
Below is a format "guide" You may redesign the format as you see fit as long as the general needed information is supplied.
[hr]
[code]
Name: How many years of experience with Photoshop or a related field? How many years of experience with Sony Vegas or a related field? Do you have an external harddisk or something related for backups? How would you rate yourself as being a trusted member of Moparscape? Can you supply graphics/video examples of your work upon a request? Please list three people who can vouch for your work. (List either msn or user profile on Moparscape) [/code]

How many years of experience with Photoshop or a related field? 4-5 Years
How many years of experience with Sony Vegas or a related field? 6 months
Do you have an external harddisk or something related for backups? Flash drives, Dropbox, Online storage
How would you rate yourself as being a trusted member of Moparscape? 10/10
Can you supply graphics/video examples of your work upon a request? Yes, Sure anytime i am on
Please list three people who can vouch for your work. I have made a banner for Mr Extremez once & some other people i cant think of but ya

item.title: Myth-Scape --GFX Spot Opened
item.dc:creator: @TheAmmoBandit TheAmmoBandit
item.description:
@TheAmmoBandit wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:17, topic:424981”][quote author=johnl17 link=topic=527644.msg3847892#msg3847892 date=1323775015]

[quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=527644.msg3847513#msg3847513 date=1323737773]

Interviews? for the love of god its a rsps dont get so official over something someones not even being paid for. you said you MIGHT give a forum rank is cold enough.
[/quote]I take Myth-Scape very seriously. We are already getting quotes from several places for a licensed verification to go on our site.

Not trying to troll but i doubt it, all runescape rights are owned by jagex, and by using there models, and characters, and item names, and other various things. You are under there mercy
[/quote]website verification has nothing to do with IN GAME copyrights…we use nothing of Jagex’s on our site.[/quote]

Actualy you do. You use the old website of RuneScape (and even the description in google lol). the website is created by Jagex so you offend their rules by using their website. You also use their images on your site saying from where they came from. So tahts annother offend against their rules. BTW did you know that a website verification is only to ensure that the website is secure? So the person who posted you use their copyrighted stuff is completely right

Other than that, nice development and good luck (but i would change your website layout atleast)

Read full topic

item.title: Myth-Scape --GFX Spot Opened
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Job Title: GFX Mod/Developer
Job Objective: Overall, to create gfx’s upon request of the administration on an as needed manner.
Job Reward: Possibly a rank on forums if chosen.

Job Description:

The gfx artist should:

-Be able to plan accordingly to his/her job.
-Be able to perform their job in a timely manner, while also taking their time for best effect and quality.
-Be able to be on a three to five hour on call weekly schedule for when gfx are needed.
-Be able to make professional looking videos.
-Be able to make professional looking signatures, banners, modicons, usergroup ranking images, and etc in a very nice quality.
-Be able to stay organized enough so where you can find a gfx if asked for an old one.
-Be able to keep backups of all graphics.
-Has the understanding that the job description may possibly change if needed.

Job Qualifications:

-At least six months of photoshop or in a related field required. (pictures)
-At least three months of sony vegas or in a related field required (videos)
-Must be a trusted member of Moparscape
-Must not be under the age of 13 (Forum Rules)
-Must be able to supply vouches/references and examples upon request of interview.

To view our entire development please go here:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

[hr]

To apply for this position you must meet all the requirements and be able to do the job reasonable enough to meet the needs of the community and server.

Below is a format “guide”
You may redesign the format as you see fit as long as the general needed information is supplied.

[hr]


Name:
How many years of experience with Photoshop or a related field?
How many years of experience with Sony Vegas or a related field?
Do you have an external harddisk or something related for backups?
How would you rate yourself as being a trusted member of Moparscape?
Can you supply graphics/video examples of your work upon a request?
Please list three people who can vouch for your work. (List either msn or user profile on Moparscape)

Read full topic
